item.description:
This double firm tour will be held on Tuesday June 21 at 6:30 at the Boston Design Center and we will be touring two different firms. 

The first is a young firm by the name of Cube. The tour will be a relaxed and conversational look into their experiences in opening their practice as well as their philosophy as well as taking a look at some of their most recent projects (they're renovating a H.H. Richardson building in Chinatown).

The second is RadLab, which is a multidisciplinary design and fabrication consulting firm located in Boston. At RadLab opportunities for integrating and intersecting disciplines are always on the agenda.

If you get lost you can always call or text me at 402-812-3625. After the tour we will be going to a bar in the area for some drinks and socializing.

RSVP @ http://www.architects.org/calendar
item.name: Design Center Architecture Firm Tours
